level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 5202(c) of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-486, August 2, 2004, 51 DCR 8236).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 5202(c) of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-594, October 26, 2004, 51 DCR 11725).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-205, see notes following ยง 47-1261.
